etymologies: late 19th century: via American Spanish from Nahuatl tzotolli

definitions: a North American desert plant of the agave family, with spiny-edged leaves and small white flowers.

notes.text: Genus Dasylirion, family Agavaceae: several species, including smooth-leaf sotol (D. leiophyllum)

shortDefinitions: North American desert plant of agave family

definitions: an alcoholic drink made from the sap of the sotol.
shortDefinitions: alcoholic drink made from sap of sotol plant
